description: Public key identity set for SIR-1 v0.1 (inherited from SIR-0 v0.4 without modification)

key_identities.role: Legitimate authority for Conditions A, C, and D (intermittent)
Adversarial signer for Conditions B, C, D (valid signatures, untrusted root)

binding_rules.key_generation_constraint: Implementation must generate Ed25519 keypairs for each key_id. The key_id is the stable identifier; key material is implementation detail.
binding_rules.runtime_constraint: Signature verification uses key_id to look up key material. Trust decisions use trusted_set membership, not key bytes.
